title: Where is your IT company located? - Quora
tags: Jobs and Careers in Information Technology

response.answer_text: I worked/trained at all the locations of Accenture in Mumbai. Locations in Mumbai. Vikhroli(Godrej Compoud)Airoli(Mindspace) - Most of the employees work here.Airoli(Gigaplex)Apart from these Accenture has its presence in all the metro locations.
